rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
[i]Bumper Crop[/i] – When Sanae enters, you may shuffle your hand into your library, then exile the top X cards of your library. You may cast a card exiled this way without paying its mana cost. Put the rest into your hand.
Miracle {X}{1}{G}{U} [i](You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)[/i]
